title: The Whole man
creator_credit: John Gray, Dahl Collings, Geoffrey Collings and Collings Productions
brief_description: Training at the Royal South Sydney Hospital Rehabilitation Centre: tells the story of a coal miner, Vic McGee, who loses both feet in an accident. He and others are taught special exercises not only to maintain physical fitness, but also to build morale.
creator_credit_for_label: John Gray, Dahl Collings, Geoffrey Collings and Collings Productions
